scripts.next:dev: cd next && bun i && SLIDES_DIR="$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/.out" bun run dev
scripts.slidev:build: cd slidev && bun i && DIR="Slidev $(echo -n 'https://example.com/slidev' | base64 | tr '+/' '-_' | tr -d '=')" && bunx slidev build --base "/slides/$(echo $DIR | sed 's/ /%20/g')/" --out "../.out/$DIR"
scripts.marp:build: cd marp && DIR="Marp $(echo -n 'https://example.com/marp' | base64 | tr '+/' '-_' | tr -d '=')" && mkdir -p "../.out/$DIR" && bunx @marp-team/marp-cli slides.md -o "../.out/$DIR/index.html"
